comment: The final drammers club pour was a secret bottle with no label. Josh Hatton himself said this was a double cask nation Craigellachie aged in 2 first fill Sherry octaves, the first ever double cask from single cask nation and this sold out fast. The best scotch of the night with notes of Raisins, Toffee, Sultanas, Dates, Cherries, Plums, Oak, Pepper, Chocolate, A little meat, Toffee, Brown Sugar, Treacle, Vanilla, Pepper, and Flowers
